code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import AlertContext from'../../context/alert/alertContext';function Alerts(){var alertContext=useContext(AlertContext);return alertContext.alerts.length>0&&alertContext.alerts.map(function(alert){return React.createElement("div",{key:alert.id,className:"alert alert-".concat(alert.type)},React.createElement("i",{className:"fas fa-info-circle"})," ",alert.msg);});}export default Alerts;
